item.title: Main Lower Lobe Cargo Door latch Systems (Electrical Function)

numlitem.para: There is no damage to the latch mechanism,
There is no damage to the master latch lock mechanism,
Doors are closed and locked using an accepted maintenance manual procedure, and
All latch cams on lower sill are confirmed to be in the closed position.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may remain displayed:

placard.para: Placard on affected cargo door control panel(s): "ELECTRICAL LATCH ACTUATION – INOP". Enter item(s) in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually check latch mechanism to confirm no damage exists.

Open, close, latch and lock the door using the appropriate Maintenance Manual procedure (AMM 52-34-00). The appropriate procedure will be contained in one or more of the following Maintenance Manual paragraphs:
Open or close door with one or more electrically inoperative actuators.
